00006 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(make_parser, 0){
00007   char* encoding = NULL;
00008   dfsch_object_t* ns;
00009   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, ns, NULL);
00010   DFSCH_STRING_ARG_OPT(args, encoding, NULL);
00011   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00012 
00013   return dfsch_xml_make_parser(encoding, ns != NULL);
00014 }
00015 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(destroy_parser, 0){
00016   dfsch_object_t* parser;
00017   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, parser);
00018   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00019   
00020   dfsch_xml_destroy_parser(parser);
00021 
00022   return NULL;
00023 }

00066 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(parse_buffer, 0){
00067   dfsch_object_t* parser;
00068   dfsch_strbuf_t* buf;
00069   dfsch_object_t* eof;
00070   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, parser);
00071   DFSCH_BUFFER_ARG(args, buf);
00072   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, eof, NULL);
00073   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00074   
00075   dfsch_xml_parse_strbuf(parser, buf, eof != NULL);
00076 
00077   return NULL;
00078 }
00079 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(parse_file, 0){
00080   dfsch_object_t* parser;
00081   char* filename;
00082   dfsch_object_t* eof;
00083   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, parser);
00084   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, filename);
00085   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, eof, DFSCH_SYM_TRUE);

00087

00090   return NULL;

00108 void dfsch_module_xml_register(dfsch_object_t* env){
00109   dfsch_provide(env, "xml");
00110 
00111   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "xml:<parser>", DFSCH_XML_PARSER_TYPE);
00112 
00113   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "xml:make-parser", 
00114                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(make_parser));
00115   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "xml:destroy-parser!", 
00116                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(destroy_parser));
00117   
00118   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "xml:set-start-element-proc!", 
00119                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(set_start_element_proc));
00120   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "xml:set-end-element-proc!", 
00121                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(set_end_element_proc));
00122   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "xml:set-character-data-proc!", 
00123                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(set_character_data_proc));
00124

00126                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(parse_eof));
00127   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "xml:parse-buffer!", 
00128                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(parse_buffer));

00130                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(parse_file));
